Description:

Transistor - a science fiction game in the genre of Action RPG from the creators of Bastion, 
in which you have to travel to the fascination of the futuristic city, defending his life 
with the help of an incredible weapon of unknown origin. Transistor organically combines 
careful strategic planning and dynamic clashes, thoughtful gameplay and fascinating atmospheric 
story. As events unfold the puzzle you have to collect from scattered fragments Transistor, 
pursuing the former owners of these weapons.

Features:

Unique world of creators team Bastion.
Setting powerful features Transistor using thousands of possible combinations of functions.
Dynamic clashes in real time mode and careful strategic planning.
Great graphics, traced by hand at a maximum resolution 1080p.
Original music changes as the game progresses.
Voice-over soundtrack throughout the game creates a massive and atmospheric history.
Repetition mode available after the completion of stories, includes procedural generation 
of combat and new combinations of functions.
Fully customizable controls, suitable for playing on a PC.

Features repack
Transistor with Update 3
Do not cut / recoded
